metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4049 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Race conditions in reference counting code were found through codeinspection. These could have resulted in potentially exploitableuse-after-free vulnerabilities. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 116,Firefox ESR < 102.14, and Firefox ESR < 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
